p: Melaleuca alternifolia EO (TTO) is defined by the international standard ISO-4730 that specifies certain characteristics of EO in order to facilitate assessment of its quality [ 21]. In this case, the used EO conforms to the ISO system: 1,8-cineol represents less than 15% (2.15%) and terpinen-4-ol, the main component, more than 30% (41.49%) of the overall composition.
